profile:
The goal at GetMovers is to provide detail-oriented moving assistance that's tailored to the needs of each customer.

That is why all GetMovers employees from call centre assistants to drivers get special trainings and their salary is highly affected by our customers satisfaction.

Our quality management system is adapting quickly to client’s needs, saving you time and money.

So, if you want to move your belongings stress-free, on time and in full safety GetMovers is the company to turn to.

We are specializing on local residential and commercial moving. Moving can be very stressful and complicated if you haven’t chosen the right moving company and completed all the preparations needed, ahead of your moving day.
You should be checking if the company have full insurance coverage for your content and the properties, full equipment including packaging materials and tools to assemble and dissemble your furniture, how many years they are in business and read their third party reviews and must have back up trucks just in case something happen on your moving date! Our Team will be happy to advice you on other things that are extremely important during your move, so call us today and will be gladly assisting you.


Moving process starts with packing.

Packing is really time consuming.

Do you know that a 2-bedroom apartment will typically take a homeowner or renter 6 hours – 1 day to pack. A two-bedroom home will likely take up to 2 days

Our trained GetMovers team is happy to free you several precious hours.

We know how to handle bulky, fragile, oddly shaped and unique items to prevent damage while transportation.
We use high quality packing supplies, containers, wardrobe boxes to ensure the smoothness of moving process.

If you prefer packing by yourself, we can deliver all necessary packing materials to your doorstep.

We also provide Partial Packing Service. It means that we would pack or unpack only large items or pack up items in a specific room.

The decision is always yours.

Get in touch and we'll Pack and unpack It for You.



Getmovers has a large operating network across Canada. So, if you. need to relocate from Toronto to Vancouver or from Edmonton to Calgary we are happy to help you.

We’re not just moving experts, we’re relocation experts. Since 2008 we constantly enriching our expertise moving people and businesses around Canada.

We have the knowledge you need for a successful relocation.

We've partnered with competent international moving companies near you to help you ship your goods to any country in the world.

You can delegate us the whole process or the most time-consuming tasks while relocation.


Get your quote on get movers.ca


Looking for secure and climate control storage space with full access to? With over 10,000 Sqft   storage capacity GetMovers provides secure solutions for short or long-term storage.

Whether you need to store furniture, commercial goods or professional equipment, our secure storage facilities across Canada are equipped with the best technology to keep your belongings safe.

Our storage facilities are regularly inspected and well equipped, we make sure your belongings are securely stored in the best conditions.

Get Movers offers both private and corporate relocation services.

A well-designed action plan of your office relocation would minimize the loss of productivity for your business.

GetMovers are well trained to pack and move your company’s assets such as office furniture and electronics to your new premises.

You probably would ask yourself after everything we covered here is why should I be choosing Get Movers? Here are only the few reasons why:
1.	All our movers are professionals and  exceptionally well trained.
2.	We use the latest technology solution to monitor live the process of your move, we know where our trucks are, crews located and their live actions (use Samsara) so while calling our customer service team will be able to answer all your questions live!
3.	Full customer service, support and management team is here to serve you 7 days a week!
4.	Back up trucks and crews in cases for last minute moves or emergencies 
5.	Exceptionally high referral rate based on our past customers that are referring us.
6.	Honest upfront pricing without any hidden fees or surprises after
7.	We are One stop shop for all your moving needs.
8.	Nationwide Canadian coverage allowing us serving you anywhere in Canada and US.
9.	Great Team with Over 12 years of successful experience in the moving industry.



So, call us now at 1888 to get your move arranged or Get your free quote on get movers.ca

Get Movers – Caring while Carrying

profile:
We’re the "Movers Who Care®". We're a lot more than two men and one truck when we need to be so no move is too big or too small.
 
With a 96% customer referral rate TWO MEN AND A TRUCK® is not just a moving company - We're a Customer Service Company that moves people. It's our goal to exceed your expectations on each and every move.

profile:
Two Small Men With Big Hearts Moving is one of Canada's largest network of independent moving companies . Our goal is to provide a top level of moving service anywhere in Canada at a competitive price. This will ensure stable, steady growth and make us a force in the future.  We offer local and long distance moving services for homes, apartments & offices within Canada.

Kingston movers ray@moving.ca 613-549-1888 or 613-968-9097
Oshawa movers (Durham region) toronto@moving.ca 905-665-6404
Greater Toronto movers toronto@moving.ca 416-663-6300
York Region movers toronto@moving.ca 905-761-7488
Barrie movers toronto@moving.ca 905-841-9210 or 705-722-9970
Mississauga movers sam@moving.ca 905-272-9310
Kitchener Waterloo movers danmayo@moving.ca 519-748-1117
Hamilton movers (Burlington) kyle@moving.ca 905-524-3278
London movers danmayo@moving.ca 519-666-3600

Some services that we provide are, local moving, Long Haul, long distance moving, National and International Moving for Residential, Office and Commercial Moves.
